meanings.definition: A carbonated soft drink flavored with extract of cola nuts, caramel, and other flavorings.
meanings.sent1: I love to drink colas with my friends during parties.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various brands of colas in the beverage section.
meanings.sent3: When the vending machine gave me two colas instead of one, I felt lucky.
meanings.sent4: The fizz of colas tickles my nose like tiny bubbles of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sound of opening a can of colas always brings back childhood memories.

meanings.definition: A tropical African and South American tree that produces cola nuts.
meanings.sent1: The explorer marveled at the tall colas standing proudly in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: Colas are known for their ability to thrive in warm climates.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the forest enjoyed swinging from the branches of the colas.
meanings.sent4: The shade provided by the colas was a welcome relief from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cola nuts from the colas filled the air with a sweet fragrance.

meanings.definition: A sweet carbonated drink containing cola flavoring.
meanings.sent1: During the picnic, we shared a refreshing bottle of colas.
meanings.sent2: The children giggled as they sipped on their colas at the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The magician made colas disappear and reappear to the amazement of the audience.
meanings.sent4: The bubbles in colas danced playfully in the glass.
meanings.sent5: The cold colas quenched my thirst on a hot summer day.
